title: Car discounts: Check offers on cars of Maruti, Tata, Honda, Hyundai, Mahindra, Skoda and Volkswagen
description: Car makers like Maruti Suzuki are offering significant discounts on various SUV models to boost sales in a slow market. This approach is driven by the need to clear inventories and attract customers amidst muted demand, as highlighted by industry analysts.
